notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

sidebar.verifyEmail: Please verify your email to access all features.

auth.signInSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.signInError: An error occurred while signing in. Please try again.
auth.signUpError: An error occurred while registering. Please try again.
auth.verificationMessage: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
auth.checkSpam: If you haven't received the email, check your spam folder or request a new link.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this setting?
settings.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this setting? This action cannot be undone.
settings.error: An error occurred while processing the request
settings.welcomeMessageDescription: The first message shown to the lead when starting a conversation. Customize the request based on whether it comes from a specific ad. If the user doesn't know the problem, enable symptom diagnosis.
settings.preQuoteMessageDescription: Used right after collecting vehicle information and calculating the Pre-Quote with AI or Dcitely. This message includes parts and labor estimates that may vary based on final inspection.
settings.contactRequiredDesc: Is contact with the customer required?
settings.featureNotAvailable: This feature is not available yet. We're working on it.
settings.name: Name
settings.agentVisibilityDescription: Control who can see and use this agent in your organization.
settings.agentVisibilityPrivateDescription: Only you and administrators can see and use this agent.
settings.agentVisibilityPublicDescription: All members of your organization can see and use this agent.
settings.deleteAgentConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this agent? This action cannot be undone.
settings.agentsDescription: Configure and customize AI agents for your business
settings.confirmDeleteAgent: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
settings.agentPersonalityDescription: The unique characteristics and behaviors of this agent.
settings.agentWelcomeMessageDescription: The first message shown to the lead when they start a conversation. Personalize the request based on whether it comes from a specific ad. If the user doesn't know the problem, enable diagnosis by symptoms.
settings.agentPreQuoteMessageDescription: Used right after collecting vehicle information and calculating the Pre-Quote with AI or Dcitely. This message includes parts and labor estimates that may vary based on final inspection.
settings.agentPreQuoteTypeDescription: Select the format and content style for your pre-quote messages to customers.
settings.preQuoteTypeStandardDescription: Basic price estimate with minimal details, good for most repair scenarios.
settings.preQuoteTypeWithWarrantyDescription: Includes warranty information and coverage details with the price estimate.
settings.preQuoteTypeDetailedExplanationDescripti: Comprehensive breakdown of parts, labor, and repair process with educational content.
settings.preQuoteTypeSpecialOfferDescription: Includes promotional discounts or limited-time offers to encourage quick booking.
settings.preQuoteTypeCustomDescription: Fully customizable message format for specialized business needs.
settings.agentAutoAssignLeadsDescription: When enabled, this agent will automatically be assigned to new incoming leads based on availability and workload.
settings.agentAutoRespondDescription: When enabled, this agent will automatically respond to customer messages without requiring manual intervention.
settings.agentTargetRoleDescription: Define which type of users can use this agent
settings.agentTargetAgentDescription: Select the agent to which conversations will be redirected
settings.chooseAIType: Choose whether to use the Quote Builder AI for lead generation or the Omni AI for Advanced marketing & optimization
settings.customizeAIInteraction: Customize how the AI interacts with customers
settings.determineLeadFiltering: Determine how AI filters incoming leads
settings.welcomeMessagePlaceholder: e.g. Welcome to AutoFix! How can we assist you today?
settings.systemInstructionsDescription: Upload or edit system instructions to control behavior
settings.systemInstructionsPlaceholder: Enter detailed instructions for the AI agent...
settings.systemInstructionsHelp: These instructions guide the AI's behavior and responses. Use markdown for formatting.
settings.documentationPlaceholder: Enter detailed documentation about this agent...
settings.documentationHelp: Document the agent's capabilities, use cases, and any special instructions for users. Use markdown for formatting.
settings.noDocumentation: No documentation available for this agent.
settings.agentSettingsDescription: Configure your AI agent's behavior and capabilities
settings.workflowAutomationDescription: Define how AI manages lead assignment and response automation. When a new lead is captured, Siblingk automatically searches Google Maps to find 5-10 nearby shops to the lead's location (ZIP code).
settings.autoAssignLeadsDescription: Automatically assign new leads to available agents
settings.aiAutoResponseDescription: Enable AI to automatically respond to customer inquiries
settings.simulationMessage: Hello, I need a quote to repair my car
settings.previewUrlDescription: Generate a URL to use this agent in chat
settings.agentNotActive: The selected agent is not currently active.
settings.leadStrategyDescription: Optimize conversation by selecting the most qualified leads based on vehicle information and workshop location. Also allows for symptom diagnosis before the quote if the user doesn't know the exact problem.
settings.expirationTimeDescription: Creates urgency and allows time for the lead to respond without losing the opportunity. After sending the pre-quote, the system allows the lead to convert within this period before sending a reminder.
settings.visibilityDescription: This option ensures that only the shop owner of the AI can manage the leads generated. If in the future you want to share the AI publicly, change to Public.
settings.crossReferenceHelp: You can create links between sections using markdown links. For example: [Link to section](#section-name)
settings.deleteAgentDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this agent? This action cannot be undone.
settings.insertHeadingLinkDescription: Select a heading to create an internal link
settings.noAgentsDescription: Create an agent to start generating leads
settings.agentNotAvailableForRole: This agent is not available for your role.
settings.adminViewingInactiveAgent: WARNING: You are viewing an inactive agent (only visible to admins).

chat.title: Chat
chat.confirmDeleteChat: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
chat.confirmDeleteAllChats: Are you sure you want to delete all chats?
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your message. Please try again later.
chat.initialMessage: Welcome to the chat! I'm here to help with your questions and assist you with what you need.
chat.chatNotFound: The chat session was not found or has been deleted.
chat.welcomeMessage: This is a new chat session. Type your first message to get started.
chat.quotationMessage: I want a quote for a repair job.
chat.agentNotActive: The selected agent is not currently active.
chat.agentNotAvailableForRole: This agent is not available for your role.
chat.adminViewingInactiveAgent: WARNING: You are viewing an inactive agent (only visible to admins).
chat.noAgentsAvailable: No agents are available to assist you at this time.
chat.updateLeadStatus: Update the current status of this lead
chat.leadStatusHelp: Select the appropriate status to track this lead through the sales process.
chat.adminChatInfo: This chat is connected to the admin webhook to manage the system.

shops.name: Name
shops.title: Shops
shops.addShopsInfo: Add shops using the 'Add Shop' button
shops.noShopsAssigned: No shops assigned to this organization
shops.allShopsAssigned: All shops already have an organization assigned
shops.createShopDesc: Create a new shop to manage your business
shops.rateDescription: The rate is the price per hour of labor. It is used to calculate the total price of the repair job.
shops.statusDescription: The status of the shop. It can be active or inactive.
shops.partsTaxPercentageDescription: The parts tax percentage is the percentage of the parts price that is added to the total price of the repair job.
shops.miscTaxPercentageDescription: The misc tax percentage is the percentage of the misc price that is added to the total price of the repair job.
shops.laborTaxPercentageDescription: The labor tax percentage is the percentage of the labor price that is added to the total price of the repair job.

connectedApps.metaAdsDescription: Enable AI-powered ad campaigns on Facebook and Instagram.
connectedApps.googleAdsDescription: Run and optimize Google ads directly from Siblingk.
connectedApps.socialMediaDescription: Allow AI to schedule and post content on connected platforms.
connectedApps.dcitellyDescription: Sync repair shop data including invoices, repair orders, and customer information.

twilioSendgrid.twilioDescription: Enable automated SMS and WhatsApp messages for leads.
twilioSendgrid.sendgridDescription: Enable email campaigns and automated lead follow-ups.
twilioSendgrid.chooseHowToReceiveLeadNotifications: Choose how you want to receive lead notifications.

security.loginActivityDescription: Review active sessions and recent logins.
security.userRolesDescription: Manage permissions for each team member.

subscriptionBilling.managePlanDescription: Manage your plan and payment options.
